UNLUCKY CO.充满了惊险和悬念，不仅是一款游戏；更是一个创新的金融生态系: UNLUCKY CO. is filled with excitement and suspense, it's not just a game; it's also an innovative financial ecosystem where you can immerse yourself and enjoy the dual thrill of gaming and investment.
每轮游戏满10人后随机结束，结束后所有玩家会随机分为两组，总金额少的一半变成倒霉: Each round of the game ends randomly after reaching 10 people. After the end, all players will be randomly divided into two groups. The half with the smallest total amount becomes the unlucky ones, and the other half becomes the lucky ones.
倒霉蛋永久成为倒霉蛋公司股东，本次充值金额全部变为公司股份，并给奖池增加等额数值: Unlucky ones become permanent shareholders of Unlucky Co., and the entire recharge amount becomes company shares, adding an equivalent value to the prize pool.
幸运儿获得奖池的88%，倒霉蛋公司股东获得奖池的8%，社区运营获得奖池的4%。: Lucky ones receive 88% of the prize pool, Unlucky Co. shareholders receive 8% of the prize pool, and community operations receive 4% of the prize pool.
将余额重新投入游戏，会额外奖励余额10%的股份！: Reinvesting your balance in the game will reward you with an additional 10% of shares!
充值金额将自动参与本轮游戏，可以多次充值同一轮游戏。填写邀请人，会将充值金额的3: Recharge amount will automatically participate in the current round of the game and can be recharged multiple times in the same round. If you fill in the referrer, 3% of the recharge amount will be given to the referrer. Otherwise, 4% will be donated to operational expenses.
所有玩家每30天可以主动申请一次分红。会获得待分红总额中你的股份占比的金额。: Every player can apply for a dividend once every 30 days. You will receive an amount based on your share percentage of the pending dividend total.
通过你的邀请链接进行游戏的玩家充值金额的3%会赠予给你。: Players who recharge via your invitation link will give you 3% of their recharge amount.
你可以捐赠给社区一定金额，并获得150%的股份。: You can donate a certain amount to the community and receive 150% of shares in return.
你可以关注社区，并获得不同金额的空投。: You can follow the community and receive airdrops of varying amounts.
充值的数量至少为0.01以太坊: The recharge amount must be at least 0.01 Ethereum.
暂不符合分红条件，请检查股份或分红时间: Does not currently meet the dividend conditions, please check shares or dividend time
请先安裝MetaMask或其他兼容的钱包: Please Install MetaMask or Other Compatible Wallet First
你可以关注社区，获得空投兑换码，可以兑换0.1ETH的股份。: You can follow the community and get airdrop redemption codes, which can be redeemed for 0.1ETH shares.
成功投入游戏，并获得了奖励: Successfully entered the game and received rewards
数值为每个用户的参与金额和钱包地址。触发游戏结束的用户，如果是倒霉蛋，那么将会获: The value is each user’s participation amount and wallet address. If the user who triggers the end of the game is unlucky, he will receive 2 times the shares.
